sentence.Network_en: She stood up and began to disrobe, folding each garment neatly.
sentence.Network_cn: 她站起来开始脱衣服，并把每件衣服叠整齐。

sentence.Network_en: She went behind the screen to disrobe.
You had no grounds to detain Mr. Logan let alone disrobe him.
sentence.Network_cn: 你们没有什么根据拘留络根先生,更不用说脱他的衣服了.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 词根联想记忆法词汇教程... ... disrespectful adj. 无礼的，轻视的 disrobe v. 脱衣服 disrupt v. 使中断，使分裂.
英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(D) ... disrespectful 失礼的 disrobe 使脱光 disroot 连根拔除.
十八级词汇 - 豆丁网 ... disinfection n. 消毒 disrobe vt. 脱去衣服, 使脱光 disruption n. 分裂, 崩溃, 瓦解.

list.abs: if she wants she will disrobe you ., 如果她想她会脱衣服你.
9 see joke : the night of chamber , bride already disrobe bed .9看笑话：洞房之夜，新娘已脱衣服上床。
but a hour went , bridegroom still is worn well outside looking at a window , the bride reminds him impatiently : " How does disrobe bed come ? "可是一个小时过去了，新郎还是穿得好好的看著窗外，新娘不耐烦地提醒他：“怎么不脱衣服上床来？”
and if you disrobed your self and watched it ., 如果你脱掉你的自我 , 看着它.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from dis- (expressing reversal) + robe, perhaps on the pattern of French desrober

example.ex: When someone disrobes, they remove their clothes.
She stood up and began to disrobe, folding each garment neatly.
example.tran: 她站起来开始脱衣服，并把每件衣服叠整齐。

sentences.sentence: "please don't undress in front of everybody!"
"She strips in front of strangers every night for a living"

auth_sentence.res_content_con: He was also reportedly forced to disrobe on a daily basis.

auth_sentence.content: Nor are patients required to disrobe in front of one another.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Nor are patients required to disrobe in front of one another.

auth_sentence.content: Her blithe willingness to disrobe without shame caused an outburst of censure from viewers.
auth_sentence.res_content: Her blithe willingness to disrobe without shame caused an outburst of censure from viewers.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Her blithe willingness to disrobe without shame caused an outburst of censure from viewers.
